titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Trafford in Lancashire at the mariage of a daughter of the right worshipfull Sir Edmond Trafforde Knight, the 6. of September Anno. 1586. By William Massie bacheler in diuinity, and fellow of Brasennose Colledge in Oxforde
titleStmt.author: Massie, William, d. 1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, and are to be solde [in London by T. Cooke] in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Tigres head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Tigres head
